description: This table contains the history of review for community resources for a patient.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CBO_HX_REVIEW_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: A history of each instant the user reviewed the community resources.

columns.name: CBO_HX_REVIEW_USER_ID
columns.description: A history of which user reviewed the community resources.

columns.name: CBO_HX_REVIEW_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A history of which CSN the community resource was reviewed on.
